code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Task from'./task';import{v4 as uuidy4}from'uuid';import'./stile.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Form_task(){const[tasks,settasks]=useState([{id:uuidy4(),nom:'REACT'},{id:uuidy4(),nom:'FIGMA'}]);const[task,setTask]=useState('');const addTask=()=>{let ntasks=[...tasks];let ntask={};ntask.id=uuidy4();ntask.nom=task;ntasks.push(ntask);settasks(ntasks);setTask('');};const supp=idp=>{alert('Etes-vous s청r de vouloir supprimer cette t창che'+idp+' ?');let ntasks=tasks.filter(t=>{return t.id!=idp;});settasks(ntasks);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"To do list "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"n1",placeholder:"enter a new task ",value:task,onChange:e=>{setTask(e.target.value);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"n",type:"button",onClick:addTask,value:"Add"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),tasks.map(t=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Task,{delf:()=>supp(t.id),txt:t.nom})," "]},t.id);})]});}
